version_name: 2.0.2 will check that your device has enough space for the OALD download and should help users who have been having problems with downloading the OALD 9th edition.Thank you to all our users for your patience while we fix bugs and issues with re-downloadin

version_description:
Please read - important news about this update!
The new OALD app gives you 100 free sample entries from the NEW OALD 9th edition, PLUS the option to download the full OALD 9th edition.
The OALD 9th edition includes NEW words, NEW usage notes, NEW fe

Thanks to your feedback, we’ve fixed a problem with spoken sentences. You will now be able to download them.

Three other features you previously requested are still there.

• You can sync Favourites and History across your devices with iClou
